license.comment: Yes. Note that this software has additional permissions and terms beyond the standard AGPLv3 license, all issued in alignment with Section 7 of the main license.

SDG[0].comment: Yes; both description and website substantiate nexus to SDG10 targets.

clearOwnership.comment: The link leads to extensive documentation about the project, including to the code repository which has a clear copyright statement in the standard AUTHORS file.

documentation.comment: Detailed documentation for installation and operation.

nonPII.comment: Yes, presuming the API returns data in a non-obstructed format, which, although generally the case, this response does not explain the output.
